Detailed Description

Convenience class for implementing an action that toggles an interface pane on/off.

This class is provided for developers who write interface panes to easily create an action that will toggle the pane on/off. Simply subclass DzPaneAction, and provide your pane class name along with any of the optional arguments. Then add the class to the classes exported by your plug-in with DZ_PLUGIN_CLASS_FACTORY().

DzPaneAction subclasses are automatically added to the main menu under 'Windows'.

Scene Info Pane sample shows an example of a new interface pane, and an action to activate it.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzPaneAction::DzPaneAction ( const char *  paneClassName  )  [protected]

Creates a new DzPaneAction. To create a new pane action, you must subclass DzPaneAction and provide the name of the DzPane subclass that is activated by the action.

Parameters:
paneClassName The name of the DzPane subclass that is activated by this action.

Returns:

void DzPaneAction::toggleAction ( bool  onOff  )  [protected, virtual]

This reimplementation toggles the pane for this action shown/hidden.
